Description: One side-wall and part of one end-wall of a wooden shabti-box; painted decoration on plaster: scene of a goddess in a tree pouring a libation before a kneeling woman; ba-bird to the side; remains of a Hieroglyphic panel and a representation of the Anubis-jackal on the end; remains of a single internal divider.
Condition: incomplete - one side-wall and part of one end-wall only
